mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, T.* FROM (SELECT V.IDX, V.MODEL, V.YEAR, V.PRICE, V.MAKER, F.TYPE AS FUEL , C.TYPE AS TYPE, L.NAME AS LOCATION FROM VEHICLE V, FUELTYPE F, CARTYPE C, LOCATION L WHERE V.CARTYPE_IDX = C.IDX AND V.FUELTYPE_IDX = F.IDX AND V.LOCATION_IDX = L.IDX ORDER BY V.IDX DESC) T) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{start} and #{end}

SELECT V.IDX, V.MODEL, V.YEAR, V.PRICE, V.MAKER, V.IMAGE , F.TYPE AS FUEL, C.TYPE AS TYPE, L.NAME AS LOCATION FROM VEHICLE V, FUELTYPE F, CARTYPE C, LOCATION L WHERE V.CARTYPE_IDX = C.IDX AND V.FUELTYPE_IDX = F.IDX AND V.LOCATION_IDX = L.IDX AND V.IDX = #{idx}
mapper.update: UPDATE VEHICLE SET PRICE = 0 WHERE IDX = #{idx}
